title: Input schema for Actor Allrecipes Scraper

searchText.title: Search text
searchText.description: Search recipes by text, separate more than one recipe using comma

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of URLs that will be scraped or crawled instead of search text.

maxItems.title: Max items
maxItems.description: Limit of detail/product pages to be scraped

extendOutputFunction.title: Extend output function
extendOutputFunction.description: Function that takes a JQuery handle ($) as argument and returns data that will be merged with the default output

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: The best option is usually Automatic proxy. But you can also use your own proxies or no proxy
